publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6826Brian Adam:BBC Sport Gets Competitive—That the Parliament congratulates BBC Scotland on successfully gaining television rights for four of Scotland’s away international football matches but notes with concern the continuing scarcity of such matches on terrestrial television and condemns the UK Government’s decision to exclude Scottish national football matches as listed events for free-to-air television.
S3M-6826 BBC Sport Gets Competitive (lodged on 17 August 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
